verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] , after [V: walking] [ARGM-DIR: away from a multi - national nuclear deal with Iran] , is calling for a new global coalition to challenge the Islamic Republic on diplomatic , political and military fronts . Secretary of State Mike Pompeo lays out a plan in first major policy address .
